AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Learner
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] never left the womb which is the Nanobotic Mass of the Engi homeworld. Until adulthood [PAWN_nameDef] was unaware of the concept of self but when [PAWN_pronoun] finally formed [PAWN_possessive] mind was filled with the knowledge of his people. However, [PAWN_nameDef] struggled to control his body and understand that other beings were individuals.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Diplomat
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Ever adventurous [PAWN_nameDef] emerged from the Nanobotic Mass early but quickly found himself without any knowledge of the world [PAWN_pronoun] just entered. Fortunately a couple of human diplomats took [PAWN_nameDef] as their son where they taught him their profession. [PAWN_nameDef] grew up as a symbol of human-Engi cooperation.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Mantis child slave
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was ripped from the Nanobotic Mass by a mantis slave trader. Since [PAWN_nameDef] hadn’t formed naturally [PAWN_pronoun] was malformed and couldn’t work his function as a mechanic as well the Mantis liked. [PAWN_nameDef] did learn however, the Mantis ways of fighting and used this to sabotage a Mantis clash with the Federation. He enlisted for the Federation cadets immediately after.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Engineer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: As soon as [PAWN_nameDef] formed [PAWN_pronoun] knew [PAWN_pronoun] calling as an engineer. [PAWN_pronoun] entered the Mechanicus soon after and did not leave for ten years. During [PAWN_possessive] time [PAWN_pronoun] built many wonders which found him at odds with the Mechanicus ultimanius. The role of a mechanica is to fix not build. [PAWN_pronoun] was expelled after erecting an enormous intricate human phallus.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Feeler
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] made a horrible discovery after [PAWN_pronoun] formed, [PAWN_pronoun] could feel. [PAWN_nameDef] kept this crime hidden as best [PAWN_pronoun] could until [PAWN_pronoun] joined an Engi effort to colonise a new planet. After witnessing his/her species use bioweapons to suppress the local wildlife, [PAWN_nameDef] broke down. Discovered, [PAWN_nameDef] ran into the forest leaving only a trail of tears.
